It’s with a heavy heart that we share the passing of comic artist Arthur Nichols at the age of 63 after a long battle with cancer. Arthur’s career spanned decades, and he made lasting contributions to the comic world, working on iconic series like Star Wars, Punisher, X-Men, Night Thrasher, Conan, and Justice League of America. He co-created the Eisner-nominated The American and the character Rose Wilson, daughter of Deathstroke. He also helped shape the look of Astro City and worked on major projects like Magnus Robot Fighter with Bob Layton at Valiant Comics.

Beyond comics, Arthur’s talents extended to commercial design, creating everything from DC Comics kids' meal toys to Star Wars cup toppers. He also worked as a storyboard artist on the Oscar-winning The Fantastic Flying Books of Mr. Morris Lessmore, as well as Ultimate Spider-Man, GI Joe, and Scooby-Doo.

Arthur’s legacy is one of creativity and passion, and he will be deeply missed by fans and colleagues alike. RIP, Arthur.

You’re Cordially Invited to Our Valentine's Tea Party! 

Bring your sweetheart—whether it’s a stuffy, action figure, doll, or another special companion—and join us for a delightful tea party experience!

Sweet Details:
Dress up in your fanciest tea outfit
Enjoy classic music as we sip on “tea”
Share a special story time with your sweetheart
Craft a secret Valentine’s card for mom and dad (shh…it’s a surprise!)
Open to all authorized patrons – CHILDREN of ALL AGES!
We can’t wait to see you and your sweethearts for a memorable Valentine’s celebration!

Register here: https://mccs-info.com/40m69vT

Push Your Limits: The Ultimate Strength Showdown!

Get ready to test your strength and determination in our thrilling fitness competition! It's time to push yourself and see if you have what it takes to join the club! 

Event Highlights:
Bench - Squat - Deadlift
1000lb Club: Men / 500lb Club: Women
Raw Competition: No supportive/assistive suits allowed!
Supportive Gear Allowed: Knee sleeves, wrist wraps, and belts. 

Open to All Ability Levels: Patrons of every skill level are welcome! Earn a Challenge Coin and T-shirt by reaching the goal! Bonus Challenge: Want to leave your mark? Aim for 1500lbs (men) or 750lbs (woman) and sign our Fitness Center Wall!  Don't miss out! Whether you are a seasoned lifter or just starting your fitness journey, this event is for you. 

Register here: https://mccs-info.com/40vA19c

Hi. We are just sharing information. You would need to reach out to Hunt directly

Administrative Assistant 
DaVita - 111 Yopp Rd, Jacksonville, NC

Be the "face" of one of the outpatient or hospital facilities-and use your administrative skills to impact the lives of our patients and their families. In this support role you will ensure the timely and accurate completion of change requisitions, treatment logs, patient charts, invoices and purchase orders. You also will assist patients with transportation arrangements and physician appointments.

Seeking personable individual with excellent computer and clerical skills (Microsoft Office). You must type 60 WPM and have a high school diploma or GED. Medical secretary or secretarial certification is preferred-as is at least 1 year in a related administrative position in a medical setting.

Apply online at: https://careers.davita.com/job/R0388864/Administrative-Assistant

NO FEDERAL OR USMC ENDORSEMENT IMPLIED

@lbcrobrivas Hi Robert! All Active Duty military, Reservists, Retirees, authorized DoD civilians, and MCCS patrons can book our cabin (and other cottages). The link to book it is in our bio! 🔗

The next course is set for February 3, 2025.  Sign up your Marines/Sailors or yourself at the Health Promotion Office located in the Semper Fit Center.

Green Machine is a course created by the Health Promotion Department to help supply all Active Duty, Reserves, their families, and DOD Civilians, with the tools to better their Health & Wellness.

The Course is 4 weeks in duration.  Week 1 consists of 5 classroom sessions, followed by workouts led by various Semper Fit Instructors from 1000-1200.  Weeks 2-4 consist of daily workouts from 1100-1200, and Friday follow-ups, tracking participants' Weight, Body Fat %, Muscle Mass, and Water Maintenance.

BCP/FEP Marines and Sailors have seat priority.  Any questions, please stop by the Health Promotion Office and see us. 

Course Registration forms can be found on the MCCS Website (Fitness tab/Health Promotion tab), or scan the QR Code on the Health Promotion Office door.  We hope to see you out there!

"Make your health a priority"
